results.description:
Interested in Ethereum, blockchain, decentralized apps? Let's come together and talk about all these new developments! It's an exciting time.

TIP: Two days before this meetup is #CRYPT070 at the same location. Don't miss it: https://www.meetup.com/Bitcoin-The-Hague/events/245768632/

We have a first date! Topics are:

üöÄ PFLAB POPUP (ALL DAY)

Bring your own tech to share during the day. A new gadget, smart watch, virtual reality app, robot? Share it at this the Permanent Future Lab popup!

Confirmed tech available to try: Homido Mini VR glasses, Trezor Bitcoin Wallet.

üê± CRYPTOKITTY MARKET PLACE (ALL DAY)

Do you own a cryptokitty? Bring it, print it, trade it. https://www.cryptokitties.co/

üí∏ WORKSHOP BITCOIN FORKS
----------- 11:00 - 11:45 --------------

There are many forks of Bitcoin these days. If you have Bitcoin, with every fork you'll get 'free money'. But how to redeem it safely?

In this session we will show you how to safely get your new coins after a fork of the Bitcoin blockchain.

If you want to practice during the session -> take the the private key of a small wallet with you, and your laptop. Here you can find out if you have coins to redeem: https://btcdiv.com/

üì¢ ANNOUNCEMENTS
---------- 15:00 -----------

- New Maker Space at The Hague Tech
- BlockRock podcast
- Start of Blockchain Lab Den Haag
- BYOA (Bring your own announcement ;)

üöÄ CODING WITH ETHEREUM ERC721
--------------------- 15:15 ---------------------

Diederik will do a Tech-talk about ERC721: a non-fungible token standard. The token standard is a 'draft', but it's already popularised by CryptoKitties.

Join to learn about the ERC721 basics, applications (kitties, art, cards, etc), wallet implementation + bottlenecks & extensions like IPFS storage.

üì∫ DEEP DIVE INTO DECRED
------------------ 15:50 -----------------

"Decred is an autonomous digital currency. The project was created to solve the forking problems of Bitcoin and launched in 2016 without ICO or external funding. Its innovative blockchain empowers stakeholders and allows for the seamless transition from one set of consensus rules to another. Stakeholders who participate in decision-making are rewarded for their efforts. The Decred project is committed to release free and open-source code.

üì£ TAKE THE STAGE
------------------ 16:20 ----------------

üçª DRINKS
--- 17:15 ---

RSVP if you'd like to join!

https://vimeo.com/92338385

This meetup is part of Vierde vrijdag: https://www.meetup.com/vierdevrijdag/events/246152200/
results.name: Blockbar. Blockchain Lab bij Vierde vrijdag! Ethereum, Bitcoin, Komodo, Decred

‚Ä¢ What we'll do

Blockbar (previously 'Blockchain Lab Den Haag') is a fysical space where you can work on blockchain projects, develop ideas & get to know other people in the scene.

Be welcome to join at the new Lab at The Hague Tech (we started last week). Every Friday, from 10am.

‚Ä¢ What to bring

This is _your_ blockchain workspace. So bring what ever you need: knowledge/experience, your laptop, ideas, hardware to program on, et cetera. Everything to work individually and collectively on projects that involve blockchain and other distributed technologies.

‚Ä¢ Location: The Hague Tech

Blockbar is located at *The Hague Tech*, the Tech Community in The Hague.

THT is a 5 minutes walk from Central Station. Find *Blockbar* in the Workspace Room (in the back).

‚Ä¢ More information

- Site: http://blockbar.nl
- Previous meetup: https://www.meetup.com/blockbar/events/222887720/

results.description:
GOOD FRIDAY SPECIAL: INSTALL A MARKET MAKER ON A RASPBERRY PI !

BarterDEX is a new, decentralized exchange for trading cryptocurrencies. You can offer liquidity and in exchange earn some money. In this workshop you'll become a Liquidity Provider using BarterDEX.

‚Çø----------‚Çø

Join us for a workshop to get started with BarterDEX, the liquidity provider of Komodo Platform (KMD). In this workshop, you will learn to set up your own liquidity provider and become your own market maker. You will learn how to trade using atomic swaps on the decentralized exchange BarterDEX running from your very own Raspberry Pi.

Built by Komodo, the world-leader in atomic swap technology, BarterDEX offers a decentralized tool (dApp) that allows anyone to make a coin conversion request of bitcoin- and Ethereum based tokens, finding a suitable match and complete the trade using an atomic cross-chain protocol. An atomic swap is a peer-to-peer trade of one cryptocurrency directly for another, without any direct IP contact between the two nodes or the use of an intermediary party.

Curious how the future of instant wallet-to-wallet trading will be? Come and build (the future)!

The workshop can be joined for free and will be run by bartwr, barv & diesmaster, open source enthusiasts and decentralized blockchain experts. Sign up to secure your spot.

We'll live stream the event on D.live: https://dlive.io/@artakush !

You can find a podcast on the event through our broadcasting partner Blockrock.nl: http://www.blockrock.nl.

This workshop is hosted by Blockbar (Blockchain Lab The Hague) and an example for future events sponsored by Komodo Pioneers.

Be your own market maker!

üè¶ WHO IS IT FOR

It is recommended that you have some knowledge of cryptocurrency wallets and transactions. You don‚Äôt have to be a developer.

üè¶ WHAT WILL YOU NEED

Obviously you need a Raspberry Pi if you want to run BarterDEX on it.

If you don‚Äôt have a Raspberry Pi, it is fun if you buy one (Pi 3). You can get them for less than 50 Euros. Find places to buy the RASPBERRY PI 3 MODEL B+: https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-b-plus/#buy-now-modal. Be sure to also bring an accompanying SD card (16 Gb).

You can also just bring your laptop and we‚Äôll go from there.

üè¶ ABOUT KOMODO PLATFORM

The Komodo project focuses on empowering users with freedom through blockchain technology. One of their powerful technologies is a new method of trading cryptocurrencies directly from one person to another through decentralized exchanges. BarterDEX, has been used to perform more than 80,000 Atomic Swaps by real-world users. http://www.komodoplatform.com

üè¶ MORE

Learn more about this workshop:
https://slides.com/bartwr/blockbar-barterdex-lp-workshop/

> A liquidity provider (LP) is a trading party that acts as a market maker buying and selling assets. They provide liquidity to the exchange, and make their profit from the spread between bid and ask orders. LP's bring price stability and make easier for traders to execute trades.

Download BarterDEX:
https://komodoplatform.com/decentralized-exchange/

BarterDEX documentation:
http://barterdex.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

Getting Started with BarterDEX:
https://youtu.be/IKByQaRys0w

BarterDEX is in beta and in heavy development. Be an early adopter :-)

üè¶ LOCATION: THE HAGUE TECH

Blockbar is located at The Hague Tech, a tech community in The Hague, reach it in 5 minutes (by foot) from Central Station. This workshop will be in the workshop space on the 3rd floor.

‚Çø----------‚Çø

Previous meetups:

https://www.meetup.com/blockbar/events/past

results.description:
This ICO Analysis we will talk about vlux.io. Next to that we will also touch WePower and PowerLedger.

* http://www.vlux.io/
* https://www.wepower.network/
* https://powerledger.io/

Etienne will do an introduction: 'A methodical approach of ICO analysis & investments.' Then we will talk about the different ICOs, in a structured format.

We will facilitate an open discussion about the merits of each project, allowing you to identify and distinguish between good and bad projects, how to make sure you aren't contributing to scams, and hear a varied selection of opinions from the other participants.

Our team will be there to moderate and share their insights from their experience in this space. You will, of course, be able to ask any questions you might have and we will be happy to answer them. We want to make sure this is an active community where you don't just come to listen but participate and learn by doing and discussing.

We would highly encourage you to read the whitepapers and check out the projects we will be discussing in advance of the meetup. This will make it more beneficial to all!

We look forward to seeing you as there is a lot to learn!

We partner with the Blockchain Reserve team (https://www.meetup.com/Den-Haag-New-Technology-Meetup/) for this meetup series.

results.description:
Have you done any crypto trading? Have you experienced how volatile the market is? What if we told you there are ways to automate the trading?

Join us for an informal discussion and presentations on how to build a trading bot and what to use it for. We organize the event together with our sister community - Ai Lab Den Haag ( https://www.meetup.com/AI-Lab-Den-Haag/ )

3rd May, at The Hague Tech.

üìä SESSION 1: Automating high-frequency trading using AI, by Sander of BlockTraders

üìä SESSION 2: Automated trading using big data by Marc & Eric

In the past year, Eric and Marc have been building a backend for automated trading on several cryptocurrency exchanges. Also, a large volume of price data from the transaction APIs has been logged. In this hands-on workshop, they will share their experiences and show you to use node.js to execute your first automatic transaction. Bring your laptop, roll up your sleeves and take the first steps on the journey to the moon!

üçπ DRINKS

üìà PROGRAM:

18:30 / Walk in

19:00 (sharp!) / First session

19:45 / Break + Pizza

20:00 / Second session

____

Do you like this type of meetups? Consider to donate to Blockbar: https://www.blockbar.nl/donate Most welcome!

results.description:
This week will be a special one! Two full days where experts share the newest developments and insights in blockchain technologies.

Even our tickets our on the blockchain! Buy your tickets: https://www.blockbar.nl/biw/tickets.php

üé™ THURSDAY PROGRAM

The sessions run parallel. To see the schedule visually, see https://blockbar.nl/biw/programme.php

16:15 Workshop: Doing Smart Contracts with Ethereum https://www.blockbar.nl/biw/lineup/lineup/lineup/workshop-doing-smart-contracts-with-ethereum

16:30 Komodo's solution for scaling: Asset chains

16:45 Blockchain for Impact, Peace Innovation Institute

17:45 Normal language for smart contracts. Legal.

17:45 Workshop by Peace Innovation Institute

18:15 Ultimate security by using Delegated Proof of Work

18:45 Collaborative Open Innovation in Science with knowledge knockon effects https://www.blockbar.nl/biw/lineup/lineup/collaborative-open-innovation-in-science-with-knowledge-knockon-effects

19:15 zkSnarks: What do they do? https://www.blockbar.nl/biw/lineup/zksnarks-what-do-they-do

20:00 Showcase of W's new app built on Ethereum

20:15 Ethergoo & Idle Games https://www.blockbar.nl/biw/lineup/ethergoo-and-idle-games

20:45 CryptoPepes.io is a blockchain powered game launching soon https://www.blockbar.nl/biw/lineup/cryptopepes-a-brief-introduction

21:10 Lightning talks: Mention your project or insights shortly

21:21 Drinks! üçπ

Note: Program time slots are not final yet. Starting times can change.

Check the Friday program as well: https://blockbar.nl/biw/programme.php
____

The first edition of Blockchain Innovation Week will take place on the 24th and 25th of May 2018, The Hague‚Äôs first two-day event where blockchain developers share the newest insights in blockchain technologies. Blockchain Innovation Week presents a program of lectures, workshops, interactive panel discussions and time for connecting with others in this emerging field. Are you a developer looking for hands-on practice? Or a business expert who wants to connect with innovative blockchain startups and ready to be inspired by visions of the future? This is your chance to be part of the next era of technology.

At Blockchain Innovation Week you can meet early adopters: start-ups, developers, makers and consultants with innovative projects. Expect deep-dives and lectures on tokenization, game economics and interactive Q&A sessions where you can ask all your questions.

This event is organised by Blockbar, consisting of a community that collaborates and exchanges knowledge on blockchain technologies. Do you work on a blockchain or distributed project? results.description:
Join the *Transparent Supply Blockchain Lab* at Border Sessions. Expect discussions & brainstorms concerning some real life applications.

üíÅ INTRODUCTION
--------------------------

This week the Border Sessions festival takes place in The Hague. Border Sessions is one of the bigger tech&culture congress festivals in The Hague, offering futuristic talks and workshops, as well as Labs.

The Border Sessions conference takes place on June 14th. The Labs on June 13th 15th & 16th.

Festival site:
https://www.bordersessions.org/

All labs:
https://www.bordersessions.org/labs/

Blockchain Lab:
https://www.bordersessions.org/lab/blockchain-transparent-supply-lab/

üë± HOW TO ATTEND
----------------------------

1. RSVP to this meetup. We have a few voucher tickets to give away; don't wait to long.

2. Register at https://www.bordersessions.org/lab/blockchain-transparent-supply-lab/

üôÜ PROGRAM
------------------

10:00 Welcome coffee

10:25 Introduction

10:30 What is blockchain and what gives it its trust?

11:00 Ten minute pitches by social entrepreneurs: the cases

11:40 Workshop #1: Brainstorm involving the 3 cases + blockchain

12:30 Workshop #1 results

13:00 Lunch

13:30 Presentation: Examples of blockchain projects by Ivo Jonkers (Foryard)

14:00 AMA (Ask me Anything) by crypto experts

14:30 Break

14:45 Workshop #2: This is how you store data on the blockchain

15:15 Closing

15:20 Buy your beer with Bitcoin, networking

16:30 Nutstuin drinks, pre-pary Border Sessions on Thursday

Read more about the participants at https://www.bordersessions.org/lab/blockchain-transparent-supply-lab/

ü§ñ SUMMARY
------------------

- Cool supply chain & blockchain sessions
- Be welcome to join, also fine if you just attend some of the sessions
- Don't forget to RSVP & register, see "HOW TO ATTEND" above

results.description:
This week Blockbar starts with coffee & 2 sessions:

1. Crypto Algo Trading without code
2. Demo: How to create your own blockchain + coin using Komodo

Next to that there's the normal schedule:

10:00 Walk in, meet people, ask questions

11:00 Mini talks / workshops, max. 30m each

12:30 Lunch

13:00 (Co)work on your projects

16:30 üíÉ Drinks üç∏üç∑

Do you work on a blockchain/distributed/crypto project? Join Blockbar, the blockchain cowork space in The Hague :)

Blockbar is a fysical space in The Hague where you can work on your blockchain project, meet people in the scene, discuss latest developments & build your business.

Be welcome to join at Blockbar at The Hague Tech. Every Friday, from 10am.

[SESSIONS:INFO]

11:00 Crypto Algo Trading without code

Create, backtest and deploy your crypto trading strategies without writing code. Mudrex is an intuitive, turing complete visual strategy editor. High performace, horizontally scalable trade execution engine. Mudrex also supports a strategy market to Pick top performing strategies shared by the best traders on the platform to invest and earn from them.

Get beta access to the Mudrex platform and start playing around with strategies.

Greg D'Souza
Managing Partner - bl0xchain

11:30 Demo: This is how you create your own blockchain

It's fairly easy to create an own blockchain & coin using the Komodo command line. The CryptoCash team recently launched their CoinCollect blockchain for their CC coin. With this experience fresh in mind, you will get the opportunity to see how coin creation works and what you need. And you can ask questions right away.

[WHAT TO BRING]

This is _your_ blockchain workspace. So bring what ever you need: knowledge/experience, your laptop, ideas, curiosity, hardware to program on, et cetera. Everything to work individually and collectively on projects that involve blockchain and other distributed technologies.

[LOCATION]

Blockbar is located at *The Hague Tech*, the Tech Community in The Hague.

THT is a 5 minutes walk from Central Station. Find *Blockbar* on the 3rd Floor at your right.

[MORE INFORMATION]

- Website: https://www.blockbar.nl
- Twitter: https://twitter.com/blockbar070
- Previous meetups: https://www.meetup.com/blockbar/events/past

results.description:
We are proud to announce we are participating in HubFest 2018!

HubFest (http://hubfest.io) is taking place the 20 + 21 September in The Hague, The Netherlands. Hubfest 2018 serves all the ingredients for bringing together innovations hubs, startups, accelerators, and incubators in one spot and acting as a catalyst for interaction. Join modern tech leaders, investors, game-changers, and thinkers and get inspired by talks, masterclasses, pitches, and interactions.
We have some serious names as speakers: Prince Constantijn, Ali Niknam from bunq, Hans Ober from Ticketswap, etc.

There will also be a Tech in practice space where a few different tech demonstrations will take place focusing on Artificial Intelligence, blockchain, cloud computing, etc.

The normal ticket for the event costs 50 EUR but we have a few invitations available for our members. Once you sign you will receive a message with a code to use for the free invitation. Because of the limited seats, please make sure you are available to join when you sign up.

Also, if you have an awesome and cool interactive demonstration of a system using blockchain that you want to showcase at the event, message us!

See you next week!
